article_text: News Corp is a network of leading companies in the worlds of diversified media, news, education, and information services.

twitter.description: When Wall Street reopened after the Sept. 11, 2001, terrorist attacks, which shut trading for four business days, the tone was resolute despite the as-expected market slide. Today in WSJ History, Sept. 18, 2001.
twitter.title: Sept. 18, 2001: Back From 9/11
